summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Alley in Block 12, Greene's Addition, being the alley between Eastlake Avenue and Franklin Avenue, from East Lynn Street to Louis Street; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7062 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
